title: Calculation - water use for family of five showers

content.prompt: A family of five recently replaced its 5-gallon-per-minute showerheads with water-saving 2-gallon-per-minute showerheads. Each member of the family averages 8 minutes in the shower per day. In a 30-day period, how many fewer gallons of water will the family use with the new showerheads?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
